page.title: 13Education
page.content: Around this area children start school at the ages of four&five.Then they stay at a Primary school until the age of eleven.After Primary school there are convents and Secondary schools such as Upton Hall Convent,Marion Bishop Challoner.They stay at those schools until they are eighteen or they can leave at the age of sixteen.The sort of exams they can take are O levels and CSE's they start to take these when they are fourteen or fifteen.There are also Nursery schools and play schools round the area and you start these at the age of three. I go to St Josephs School in Upton and it is a Primary School.....
